cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to '999.999.999.999' (invalid IP format) will cause network interface configuration failure and AMF connection error.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power) will cause invalid SSB power configuration error and synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100（超過允許的最大功率）會導致無效 SSB 功率配置錯誤，並造成同步失敗。
